mapper.sql: id, cashier_desk_id, place_order_date, member_id, original_count_money, practical_money, discount_money, sell_count, single_score, emp_id, ticket_id
mapper.select: select s.shop_name, cd.id cashier_desk_id, cd.cashier_name, t.id, t.place_order_date, t.sell_count, t.original_count_money, t.practical_money, t.discount_money, m.member_name, emp.emp_name from ticket t left join cashier_desk cd on t.cashier_desk_id = cd.id LEFT join shop s on cd.shop_id = s.id LEFT join employee emp on t.emp_id = emp.id LEFT join member m on t.member_id = m.member_name WHERE t.id = #{id}
